features: 🚿【Fast heating, Only 10s!】2500W strong power steam cleaner can generate 229°F/105°C high temperature and 3BAR pressure steam within 10s, effectively remove stubborn greasy dirt and stains. 2500W heater steam cleaners for home use make your cleaning more efficient and convenient!

🚿【6 Speeds & 3 Different Brush Heads】The multifunctional steam cleaner is equipped with 6 speeds and 3 different brush heads, which can be adjusted according to your specific cleaning needs and can handle various cleaning tasks. Easily removes oil, dirt and grime for a clean and comfortable living space.

🚿【Eliminate Stubborn Stains】This steamer for cleaning is simple and easy to use, it only requires simple steps to get your stubborn stains cleaned off. This high pressure steam cleaner includes 1 steam cleaner, high pressure extension rod, 3 brush heads.

🚿【1L Extra Large Water Tank】Handheld steam cleaner large water tank capacity can be used continuously for up to 1 hour without frequent refilling, which improves your cleaning efficiency. It is also highly acid resistant and can be used with cleaning and sanitizing solutions.

🚿【Easy to store and move】Portable size and lightweight design make it easy to store and carry without taking up too much space. The handheld steam cleaner extension pole, long cable, and non-slip handle design are perfect for mobile cleaning without making you feel tired.Great for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, cars and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works but could use a a handheld switch
reviews.reviewText: The steamer works great! It's small yet holds plenty of water to do a job without having to stop to refill too often. The hose gets hot so make sure to keep it away from your arm while you're using it. It could use a hand switch or standby button or something so you're not constantly turning it off or on. The cord could also be longer. And the attachments are...meh. Wish it had an assortment of attachments or at least be compatible with other brands. But for what its got, it dies what it's supposed to do.Would definitely buy again and recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for cleaning corners, crevices
reviews.reviewText: Decent pressure to clean, brushes work great. Good value for quick, smaller jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!!!
reviews.reviewText: Don’t underestimate this little machine just because of its size; it is a wonderful cleaning tool! It cleaned my kitchen tile back slash and grout, floor tile grout, auto interior trim, and vent-a-hood metal without having to use harsh chemicals or elbow grease. I did rub a little dawn dish soap with a cloth over some of the back splash tile that was behind the cooktop because of the extra grease splats, but the steamer did the work for me. Would definitely strongly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my car, but ended up using it on my living room rug. If you have stains that won't go away from pets and children like I do, this is a godsend. It blasted everything away like a laser tattoo removal, I was truly amazed by this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wand gets hot.
reviews.reviewText: Steamer works fine, but the wand gets very hot very quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the money, this thing works wonders!
reviews.reviewText: My 2006 Lexus LX 470 came with factory protective film on the front end. It had overstayed its welcome, becoming a major detractor for my rig. I picked up this steamer thinking maybe I could get the film off with it. Now this is not a very easy job, but the steamer made it possible. After using rapid release adhesive remover, the front end looks like new. If you have a big cleaning job, this little guy actually works pretty dang good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Steam cleaner is too cold to clean or sanitize anything
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steam cleaner hoping to clean and disinfect my floors and other surfaces, but I was very disappointed with its performance. The steam (warm water fine mist) was NOT hot enough. steam cleaners need to reach high temperatures and maintain contact with the surface for several minutes to disinfect and sanitize properly . This steam cleaner barely reached 100°C (212°F). I felt like I was just spraying fine mist of warm water, not steam. This defeats the whole purpose of using a steam cleaner, which is to use the power of heat and pressure to remove dirt and kill germs without chemicals. To test this steamer, I tried cleaning out my window sills, and it failed miserably. The picture below shows how dirty they still were after using the steam cleaner. I have a lot of experience using an industrial clothing steamer/press and using that clothing steamer, which has no pressure, would have cleaned it better than this supposedly pressurized steam cleaner. It's a glorified warm water sprayer. I do not recommend this product to anyone who wants a reliable and effective steam cleaner. It is a waste of money and time. (See image)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Steam Cleaner is a bit disappointing.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to clean the grout on my floor tile. it tries to do the job but just isn't powerful enough to do much cleaning. it doesn't get hot enough to do much of anything. I can put my hand in the "steam" it makes... I will be returning this and will try again to find something that works to clean grout.
